categories: Category:Imperial Navy officers of the Galactic Empire

nodes.text: Desanne was an Imperial Navy officer from Kalist VI. Due to a political blunder in 3 ABY, Commander Desanne was stripped of most official duties and relegated to shuttling dignitaries and high ranking Imperial officials. After Darth Vader failed to catch Luke Skywalker on Cloud City, Vader had Desanne bring his shuttle to transport him to the Executor.
This character was portrayed by Patrick Ginter.
